message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested, but $110 is a bit outside my budget.  Would you be willing to go down to $100? I'm ready to purchase today if we can agree on that price.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I've got some costs associated with this product that I'd like to cover. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $105. What do you think?
